item.title: Lobsters Top Stories: Thursday, December 5, 2024 at 10:15 PM UTC
item.description:
1. The "simple" 38 step journey to getting an RFC (24 points | 5 comments)
2. Keyset Cursors, Not Offsets, for Postgres Pagination (53 points | 20 comments)
3. Advent Of Code 2024 in Nix - Day 01-03 (14 points | no comments)
4. Flightle – Web-based 2D sidescrolling flight simulator (9 points | 2 comments)
5. Alpine Linux 3.21 (17 points | 2 comments)
6. Breakage! in the Cargo.toml — How Rust Package Features Work (And Break) (11 points | no comments)
7. A simple live calculator with tree-sitter + cranelift jit (7 points | no comments)
8. Praise to scdoc to generate man pages (27 points | 15 comments)
9. Structured binding upgrades in C++26 (15 points | 4 comments)
10. Reversing Anti-Cheat's Detection-Generation Cycle With Configurable Hallucinations (7 points | no comments)
11. NASA Graphics Design Manual (1976) (9 points | 3 comments)
12. Speeding up Ruby by rewriting C in Ruby (47 points | 22 comments)
13. How to pack ternary numbers in 8-bit bytes (5 points | 2 comments)
14. NAVAL GUN Fire Control System software is written in C++, says job listing (2 points | 5 comments)
15. You can’t get more adversarial than PvP MMORPGs (8 points | no comments)
16. “This is Just a Prototype”: How Ethics Are Ignored in Software Startup-Like Environments (5 points | no comments)
17. Compressed Random-Access Trees for Spatially Coherent Data (2007) (5 points | no comments)
18. First impressions of the new Amazon Nova LLMs (via a new llm-bedrock plugin) (17 points | 9 comments)
19. The Acton Programming Language (2 points | no comments)
20. frood, an Alpine initramfs NAS (2 points | no comments)
21. Rust FFI vs Golang FFI (cgo) (2021) (1 points | no comments)
22. This Month in Redox - November 2024 (1 points | no comments)
23. What's up with Lobste.rs blocking the Brave browser? (26 points | 36 comments)
24. Egoless Engineering (89 points | 15 comments)
25. A complex bug with a ⸢simple⸣ fix (11 points | 14 comments)
